name: Cacophony of Cinders
flavor: You tumble through the battle, stabbing foes and teleporting allies.

metadata.flavor: You tumble through the battle, stabbing foes and teleporting allies.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: You shift up to twice your speed, making one power roll that targets each creature you come adjacent to during the shift.

effects.tier1: An enemy takes 6 damage; an ally can teleport up to 3 squares.
effects.tier2: An enemy takes 10 damage; an ally can teleport up to 5 squares.
effects.tier3: An enemy takes 14 damage; an ally can teleport up to 7 squares.
